15.post_text: Open up to our new story of design, versatility and performance: ferrariportofino.com #FerrariPortofino #Ferrari

comments.message: I must say, im not that blown away by the design. I mean, it s a Ferrari, it looks good, but by Ferrari standards it looks kinda..meh. I miss the audacious styling they had with the 512, F40. I know those cars are from a different era, but you gotta admit, a 512 looks much more "Ferrari-like" even though it was a terrible car. Appart from the 458, post 355/360 Ferrari just don't seem to have that Ferrari zing

Thank you for NOT putting black rims on this car. I hope other auto manufacturers follow your lead and realize the trend is over and go back to beautifully designed wheels you can see.   Bravo, Ferrari!

Qual'è la miglior Ferrari signor Enzo? "la prossima" rispose.
Però questa nascondiamogliela, meglio non lo sappia. 
Eleganza e sportività non stanno poi così bene insieme, meglio grinta e sportività. Mio punto di vista.
Alessandro prima ho pensato: però sono tutte uguali ste Ferrari. Poi l'ho guardata bene: però è veramente figa. Ogni Ferrari ha il suo perché e non puoi non innamorartene.

Good afternoon! I came up with a new kind of propulsion for high-speed ferries, yachts and rescue and fire ships. Speed from 70 to 150 knots, аt the same fuel consumption as on standard modern water-jett.  His is not done anywhere else. 
The sale of several patents will bring you a good income, I want 50% of the future sale of patents and a small reward for each boat or ferry built. Large shipbuilding companies will probably immediately start doing something similar to my invention, I am sure of this 100%, because I studied a lot of forums and looked at thousands of websites! I am a mechanic and a former trucker, this idea came to me when at one forum the russian shipbuilders began to argue. Some build ships on an air pillow, and the second - ekranoplans. But this is a dead-end way of development of high-speed boats and ferries, because fuel consumption is very high and sea carriers will not buy their boats.
